io.name: SSUIOCCTJA02501_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" name="acptStoreCd"> <annotation> <documentation>접수점코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N"
